data.actual_result: You will now be able to type in the channel while the share menu is still visible.
data.expected_result: It returns to the share menu and is the same as it should be.
data.short_description: You can type in the chat after opening the quick switcher menu while the share invite menu is open
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a new Discord or scroll up to the top of the first channel in a Discord -  Click the blue "share button" in the second row of text (Invite your friends) -  Press CTRL + K (CMD + K for OSX) to open the channel switcher - Press ESC to return to the share menu
